Item ID1635

A gold ring can be worn in the ring slot, but they do not give bonuses and, like all rings, they are not visible on player characters. However, they can be sold for up to 245 coins to Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim.

A gold ring is a reward found in the Casket from the Pirate's Treasure quest, and an item found in bird nests. It is also a possible reward from the Capt' Arnav's Chest random event.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In a 2018 update, the sprites for unenchanted jewelry were rotated to distinguish them from their enchanted counterparts. However, the gold ring, alongside other gold jewellery, was unaffected by this change.
  • The gold ring is nearly identical in appearance to the ring of visibility.
